content: the finished toy will be about 9 5 cm \ 3 75 in\ tall difficulty level beginner all parts of the toy are worked in continuous spiral rounds there is only minimal sewing involved arms and legs are attached while the body is being crocheted ears are crocheted onto the head black lines are embroidered you will need 3 main colors orange white and black in the pictured sample for the body of the tiger plus 4 matching colors for the pants *additional supplies and notions * safety eyes 2 tiny buttons 2 key fob hardware piece of reflecting tape for the optional reflecting circle design © 2021 marina chuchkalova translation from the russian © 2021 katharina sokiran
